sections.heading: Repealed.Section 22-13D-2 - Repealed.Section 22-13D-3 - Repealed.Section 22-13D-4 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2019, ch. 206, § 2; 2019, ch. 207, § 2; repealed by Laws 2023, ch. 19, § 5.

Repeals.— Laws 2023, ch. 19, § 5 repealed 22-13D-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2019, ch. 206, § 2 and Laws 2019, ch. 207, § 2, relating to short title, effective July 1, 2023. For provisions of former section,seethe 2022 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
